item.title: RMS recon
item.description: TRAN TRAN_A Index: 1,1,1, PACK_IND Indicates whether or not the item is a pack item. TRAN_CODE Tran_code : Identifies the transaction type. Valid values are: 0 Ordering 1 Net Sales 2 Net Sales VAT Exclusive 3 Non-inventory Items Sales/Returns 4 Returns 5 Non-inventory VAT Exclusive Sales 6 Deals income (Sales) 7 Deals income (Purchases) 8 Fixed Income Accrual 10 UNITS
